source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.title: Simple Smart Business System
items.headline: Learn How Easy It Is To Start A Business - Solving Local Problems With A Globally Outsourced Workforce
objectives_summary: Have an idea for a business? We'll help you determine if it's viable in your market.
Have a passion? We'll help you find a niche that you'll love!
You'll also learn how to use almost any previous life or work experience in your new life as an entrepreneur.

items.title: SWOT Masterclass: Innovative Tactics for Crafting Strategy
items.headline: From SWOT to Strategy to Execution
objectives_summary: The role and place of SWOT in context of business planning
Populating the SWOT using appropriate techniques
Analyzing and applying the SWOT to craft strategy

items.headline: Learn 10 step Brand Storytelling System with Visual data driven approach examples with Story Structure & Case Studies
objectives_summary: Effectively Pitch the Story of Your Business and Sell the Core Benefits of Your Products and Services
Practice your skill in two live projects plus assignments related to Digital Storytelling and Storytelling with data.
Practice and Analyze your skills in Live Projects, Assignments and Workbook- which can be used as a ready reference

Learn how to upscale your business in Fiverr to $3000/month
7 Unique Fiverr Gigs to offer without any skill (All tools provided)

Understand the nuances of a Digital Strategy and how to design one
Quickly build a strong foundation of Digital Strategy and Transformation mindset

3. Different methods of estimating market size: their advantages and disadvantages
